column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A------ young man and woman died in the road
column4: and another woman was  seriously injured after a motorcycle was hit by a car.------This horrific incident happened at 2:40 am on the morning of February 24
column7: at Steung Mean Chey.------The victims have not yet been identified. According to a source from the scene
column9: a young man  and two women on a motorbike werr travelling at high speed when they collided with a car
column10: also speeding.------The unknown make of car did not stop
column12: leaving the victims dead on the road.------After the accident
column13: the injured woman was taken to a private clinic.------Police are searching for family members to take the bodies for the traditional rites. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/416368
